Insights (click to expand)

                        

                            
ⓘ Start up time denotes the time to spin up
                                a worker. Init time is the time a worker spends on the initialization function, when
                                provided. Waiting time is the time a worker needs to wait for new tasks to come in.
                                Working time is the time a worker spends on the task at hand. Exit time is the time a
                                worker spends on the exit function, when provided.
